lines.text: So uh, what'cha running away from kid?
Who says I'm running away from anything?
Heh, I can read ya's like a book, kid. Your family never understood ya. Your friends, they all turned their backs on ya. You couldn't take it anymore, so ya's upped and ya's left.
Wow, you're good.
Look we're under a mistletoe do you know what that means, you have to kiss me.

[Boone and Doggle have just messed up their job]
Do you think we'll still get our promotion?

[grumpily]
Take it off
[Doggle removes his hat and Boone instantly knocks him on the head]
[Stormella has just left room and is going to conjure storm]
[sighs]
I've ruined everything
no, it's my fault
But I crossed the bridge
I ran away
you wouldn't have run away if I didn't tell you, well, Rudolph, you mean everything in to me.

[cackles]
Well, ya crossed mah bridge,
[take out wand]
thanks to you I get to get to make storm that'll put Santa out of business for good,
[Zoey attempts to run away but Stormella blocks the former with all wall of ice]
look, nowhere to run, nowhere to hide.

[Stormella grants Rudolph wish to become nice]
Oooo cute little penguin
[picks Ridley up and starts kissing him]

[clearly irrattated]
Can someone change her back PLEASE!
Someday I'll make you proud of me pop

[singing]
show me the light/when I fear the dark
a ray of sunshine
a rainbows arc
show me the light
[slyly is trying to steal keys from a sleeping stormella]
[partcially waking]
what are doing?
stealing the keys to the dungeon, now go back to sleep
oh okay,
[falls back to sleep]
toodles

[dumbfounded]
wanndaya know this truth thing really does work!
